page.title: 08Employment,trade,education
page.content: On outskirts of Roffey is engineering company at Christian Training college, in Colgate, a Business college both offering residential accommodation. Colgate also boasts the only county primary school in area. The last three offer catering, domestic and teaching employment A New venture has been recently started in Forest Road, a vineyard. It stared in 1981 first vintage in 1983. Its producing a light white refreshing wine. At present 5 acres of mainly white grapes are grown, with the pressing fermenting and bottling done under contract. When future plans are completed it will all be done on the premises.Whether the new and improved road will encourage more industry and housing remains to be seen. Horsham Council are keen to keep the strategic gap twixt Faygate and Crawley a green and pleasant
